task_description: Navigate to Hamburg. The route begins by walking straight along the sidewalk with a large stone building on the left. At the corner, it turns right to cross the street towards the large glass-roofed bus station (ZOB Hamburg). After crossing, the path turns right again to proceed along the sidewalk with the glass building on the right.
